data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Atlantique, Benin so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Atlantique, Benin
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Atlantique, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Atlantique who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Atlantique.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Gbe, Seto people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage the church of Atlantique, Benin that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Atlantique, Benin to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Atlantique an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Atlantique
location.people_groups_list: Biali, Anii, Aguna, Burusa, Bulba, Songhai-Koyraboro
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Biali (162,000), Anii (19,000), Aguna (19,000), Burusa, Bulba (2,600), Songhai-Koyraboro (9,000)
